channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Justice Department and New York City mayor face judge’s scrutiny in bid to dismiss criminal charges
item.description: Justice Department lawyers and New York City Mayor Eric Adams are set to face a federal judge who is signaling that he’s unlikely to rubber stamp their request to drop corruption charges weeks before an April trial.

item.title: Meet Dale E. Ho, the second-year judge weighing the future of NYC Mayor Eric Adams’ corruption case
Winter’s next wave of storms takes aim at the East Coast
